mapper.select: SELECT singer.name singerName, song.name songName, song.album songAlbum, song.pic songPic, song.id songId, song.url songUrl, song.lyric songLyric FROM song LEFT JOIN list_song ON song.id = list_song.song_id LEFT JOIN singer ON song.singer_id = singer.id WHERE list_song.song_list_id = ${songListId}
